doc.previous: Research in this area attempts to understand the relation between expert knowledge and exceptional performance in terms of cognitive structures and processes The fundamental aim of this research is to describe what it is that experts know and how they use their knowledge to achieve performance that most people assume requires extreme or extraordinary ability Studies have investigated the factors that enable experts to be fast and accurate 1
